PromotionLimit.name: PromotionLimit
PromotionLimit.description: Represents the limit of a promotion.

Category.description: Required. The category of promotion limit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramCurrencyId.description: ID of the loyalty program currency for which the promotion limit is set. Specify a loyalty program currency when the limit type is PointsCredited.

Name.description: The autogenerated unique number of the record.

PromotionId.description: ID of the promotion that the limit is for.

Type.description: Required. The type of promotion limit.

Value.description: Required. The value of the promotion limit.
